trans-unit.source: Represents a single item in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
trans-unit.target: Representerer ett enkelt element i en [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] prosjektet.

trans-unit.source: An element in a project can represent multiple items through the use of wildcards.
trans-unit.target: Et element i et prosjekt kan representere flere elementer ved hjelp av jokertegn.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each BuildItem object does not necessarily represent an `Item` element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Derfor hvert BuildItem objekt utgjør ikke nødvendigvis et `Item` elementet i prosjektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> class based on an <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> klassen basert på en <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*>for den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> from which to create the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref> å opprette den <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>for den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property values.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <> </> *> og <> </> *> egenskapsverdier.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*>for den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>for den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en lite kopi av det <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av det <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den `Condition` attributtverdien for elementet.

trans-unit.source: The `Condition` attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Den `Condition` attributtverdien for elementet.

trans-unit.source: Copies all item metadata on this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Overfører alle element-metadata i denne <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> til den angitte <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to which to copy the item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref> du vil kopiere element-metadata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of custom attributes that are set on this item.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall egendefinerte attributter som er angitt i dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by CustomMetadataCount does include pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers, because they are not custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av CustomMetadataCount inneholder forhåndsdefinert eller reservert elementet spec modifikatorer, fordi de ikke egendefinerte attributter.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating how many custom attributes are set on this item.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som angir hvor mange egendefinerte attributter som er angitt for dette elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets all user-defined or custom attribute names.
trans-unit.target: Henter alle brukerdefinerte eller egendefinerte navn.

trans-unit.source: CustomMetadataNames does not include the names of non-user-defined or non-custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: CustomMetadataNames inneholder ikke navnene på ikke-brukerdefinert eller ikke egendefinerte attributter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing string names for all of the user-defined or custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder streng navn for alle brukerdefinerte eller egendefinerte attributter.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Exclude` attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den `Exclude` attributtverdien for elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Exclude` attribute value of the item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den `Exclude` attributtverdien for elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Henter den siste spesifikasjonen for elementet når alle jokertegn og egenskaper som er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: The final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Den endelige angivelse av elementet etter at alle jokertegn og egenskaper som er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for det angitte elementet metadata etter etter at alle elementet og egenskapen referanser er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
trans-unit.target: Verdien av angitte element-metadata etter etter alle elementet og egenskapen referanser er evaluert.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer verdien for den angitte element-metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den angitte element-metadata.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the item has the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Angir om elementet har angitte element-metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item has the specified item metadata; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet er det angitte elementet databasemetadata; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Include` attribute that created the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den `Include` attributt som opprettes av <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The `Include` attribute that created the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den `Include` attributt som opprettes av <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the item was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om elementet ble importert i prosjektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet er importert til prosjektet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of metadata set on the item
trans-unit.target: Henter antall metadata som er angitt i elementet

trans-unit.source: The value returned by MetadataCount includes pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers as well as other metadata.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av MetadataCount inkluderer forhåndsdefinert eller reservert elementet spec modifikatorer i tillegg til andre metadata.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the number of metadata items.
trans-unit.target: Et heltall som representerer antall elementer i metadataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of metadata on the item, including pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers.
trans-unit.target: Henter navn på metadata på elementet, inkludert forhåndsdefinerte eller reservert elementet spec modifikatorer.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by MetadataNames includes the names of all metadata, including user-defined and custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres av MetadataNames inneholder navnene på alle metadata, inkludert brukerdefinerte og egendefinerte attributter.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing name strings of all metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>med navnet strengene av alle metadata på elementet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på elementsamlingen elementet tilhører.

trans-unit.source: The name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementsamlingen elementet tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne den angitte verdien til den angitte element-metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata value.
trans-unit.target: Elementverdien metadata.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata, and optionally treats the metadata as a literal value.
trans-unit.target: Tilordne den angitte verdien til den angitte element-metadata, og behandler eventuelt metadataene som en litteral verdi.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata name.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på elementet metadata.

trans-unit.source: The item metadata value.
trans-unit.target: Elementverdien metadata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the metadata as a literal value by escaping all [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] special characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Behandle metadataene som en litteralverdi ved escaping alle [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] spesialtegn; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
